definition.script:
node('jdk8') { stage 'Build'
git url: 'https://github.com/siamaksade/openshift-tasks.git' def mvnHome = tool 'M3' def mvnCmd = "${mvnHome}/bin/mvn -s ${env.JENKINS_HOME}/settings.xml" sh "${mvnCmd} clean install"
stage 'Test' sh "${mvnCmd} test"
stage 'Push to Nexus' sh '${mvnCmd} deploy'
}
